title: Conversion Hub Marketing Launches Ask Alvin Lead Generation Platform
text:
October 13, 2015 at 03:05 AM EDT Conversion Hub Marketing Launches Ask Alvin Lead Generation Platform 
Conversion Hub Marketing - A SPH Associate Company, launches Ask Alvin Lead Generation Platform for customer relationship management and leads tracking. 
Singapore, Singapore - October 13, 2015 /MarketersMedia/ — 
While online marketing continues to mature, email marketing and customer relationship management systems still remain the backbone marketing system of most business. Because of this, Conversion Hub Marketing has launched its Ask Alvin Lead Generation CRM Platform to catering to this rising demand. Brands that have worked with Conversion Hub include Packard Bell, Bayer Healthcare, Nexus, Singapore Management University, and MSDN. 
The Ask Alvin Lead Generation CRM Platform captures qualified leads, generates a digital sales funnel, automates email dripping and much more. It is the preferred solution to email marketing in Singapore . This 100% Regulation and CAN-SPAM Compliant software was voted to be the most intuitive email campaign designer, along with featuring a complete range of automation options. 
Along with Ask Alvin Lead Generation CRM Platform, there is also a mobile app that helps businesses quickly and easily increase revenue, customer satisfaction, productivity, and brand loyalty. Both the Ask Alvin Sales CRM system and mobile app are free for businesses to try out. A free, no obligation consultation is also available for businesses to assess the opportunities. 
The Ask Alvin Lead Generation CRM Platform is ICV and PIC eligible. Additionally, they are 100% PDPA Compliant and offer guarantees of receiving the highest conversions. 
The other services offered by Conversion Hub Marketing include website design in Singapore , usability user testing , email marketing, and online media placement. 
To find out more about Conversion Hub Marketing's Ask Alvin Lead Generation CRM Platform, you can send an enquiry to biz@conversion-hub.com or call +65 6844-3935, Monday through Friday between the hours of 10am and 7pm GMT +8. 
About Conversion Hub Marketing Conversion Hub Marketing is a SPH Associate Company. Conversion Hub Marketing is an Internet Marketing Company in Singapore that specializes in lead generation solutions built around its Ask Alvin Lead Generation Platform. 
About SPH Incorporated in 1984, main board-listed Singapore Press Holdings Ltd (SPH) is Asia’s leading media organisation, engaging minds and enriching lives across multiple languages and platforms. Singapore Press Holdings Limited is a media organisation in Singapore with businesses in print, Internet and new media, television and radio, outdoor media, and property. SPH has over 5,000 employees, including a team of approximately 1,000 journalists, including correspondents operating around the world. The company is one of the country's "blue-chip" counters on the Singapore Stock Exchange, and makes about S$480–500 million worth of profits every year. 
For more information about us, please visit http://www.conversion-hub.com
